mapper.sql: ID, PROJECT_ID, STATUS, ADDRESS, EXPERTS_TYPE_ID, TENDER_TIME, "RESPONSE TIME", AGE_MAX, SATISFY_CONDITION, CATEGORY_ID, EXPERT_COUNT, EXPERT_ID, EXPERTS_FROM, ADDRESS_ID, AGE_MIN, EXTRACT_ADDRESS,ADDRESS_REASON,CATEGORY_NAME,EXPERTS_QUALIFICATION
mapper.insert: insert into T_SES_EMS_EXP_EXT_CONDITION (ID, PROJECT_ID, STATUS, ADDRESS, EXPERTS_TYPE_ID, TENDER_TIME, "RESPONSE TIME", AGE_MAX, SATISFY_CONDITION, CATEGORY_ID, EXPERT_COUNT, EXPERT_ID, EXPERTS_FROM, ADDRESS_ID, AGE_MIN, EXTRACT_ADDRESS,ADDRESS_REASON) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expertsTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tenderTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{responseTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ageMax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{satisfyCondition,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{categoryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expertCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{expertId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expertsFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addressId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ageMin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extractAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), #{addressReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),

insert into T_SES_EMS_EXP_EXT_CONDITION
ID,
PROJECT_ID,
STATUS,
ADDRESS,
EXPERTS_TYPE_ID,
TENDER_TIME,
"RESPONSE TIME",
AGE_MAX,
SATISFY_CONDITION,
CATEGORY_ID,
EXPERT_COUNT,
EXPERT_ID,
EXPERTS_FROM,
ADDRESS_ID,
AGE_MIN,
EXTRACT_ADDRESS,
ADDRESS_REASON,
CATEGORY_NAME,
EXPERTS_QUALIFICATION,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{expertsTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{tenderTime,jdbcType=DATE},
#{responseTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ageMax,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{satisfyCondition,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{categoryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{expertCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{expertId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{expertsFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{addressId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ageMin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{extractAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{addressReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{categoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXPERTS_QUALIFICATION = #{expertsQualification,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
select sys_guid() from dual
mapper.update:
update T_SES_EMS_EXP_EXT_CONDITION
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXPERTS_TYPE_ID = #{expertsTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TENDER_TIME = #{tenderTime,jdbcType=DATE},
"RESPONSE TIME" = #{responseTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AGE_MAX = #{ageMax,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SATISFY_CONDITION = #{satisfyCondition,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXPERT_COUNT = #{expertCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
EXPERT_ID = #{expertId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXPERTS_FROM = #{expertsFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS_ID = #{addressId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AGE_MIN = #{ageMin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXTRACT_ADDRESS = #{extractAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS_REASON = #{addressReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CATEGORY_NAME = #{categoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXPERTS_QUALIFICATION = #{expertsQualification,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where 1=1
AND ID= #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND PROJECT_ID = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_SES_EMS_EXP_EXT_CONDITION set PROJECT_ID = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXPERTS_TYPE_ID = #{expertsTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TENDER_TIME = #{tenderTime,jdbcType=DATE}, "RESPONSE TIME" = #{responseTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AGE_MAX = #{ageMax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SATISFY_CONDITION = #{satisfyCondition,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXPERT_COUNT = #{expertCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, EXPERT_ID = #{expertId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXPERTS_FROM = #{expertsFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS_ID = #{addressId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AGE_MIN = #{ageMin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXTRACT_ADDRESS = #{extractAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ADDRESS_REASON = #{addressReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT EC.*, CT."ID" AS ctid, CT.CATEGORY_NAME,CT.EXPERTS_COUNT,CT.EXPERTS_QUALIFICATION,CT.EXPERTS_TYPE_ID as cttypeid,CT.CATEGORY_ID AS gid ,CT.IS_MULTICONDITION FROM T_SES_EMS_EXP_EXT_CONDITION ec LEFT JOIN T_SES_EMS_EXP_EXT_CON_TYPE ct ON EC."ID"=CT.CONDITION_ID

SELECT EC.*, CT."ID" AS ctid, CT.CATEGORY_NAME,CT.EXPERTS_COUNT,CT.EXPERTS_QUALIFICATION,CT.EXPERTS_TYPE_ID as cttypeid,CT.CATEGORY_ID AS gid ,CT.IS_MULTICONDITION FROM T_SES_EMS_EXP_EXT_CONDITION ec LEFT JOIN T_SES_EMS_EXP_EXT_CON_TYPE ct ON EC."ID"=CT.CONDITION_ID WHERE EC.PROJECT_ID=#{projectId}
SELECT "COUNT"(*) FROM T_SES_EMS_EXP_EXT_CONDITION WHERE PROJECT_ID=#{projectId} AND STATUS=1

SELECT EC.*, CT."ID" AS ctid, CT.CATEGORY_NAME,CT.EXPERTS_COUNT,CT.EXPERTS_QUALIFICATION,CT.EXPERTS_TYPE_ID as cttypeid,CT.CATEGORY_ID AS gid ,CT.IS_MULTICONDITION FROM T_SES_EMS_EXP_EXT_CONDITION ec LEFT JOIN T_SES_EMS_EXP_EXT_CON_TYPE ct ON EC."ID"=CT.CONDITION_ID where EC.PROJECT_ID =#{projectId}

delete.if: DELETE T_SES_EMS_PROJECT_EXTRACT WHERE EXPERT_CONDITION_ID = #{_parameter} AND OPERATING_TYPE = 0
